sentences.en: A single index may reflect a composite, or group, of changing variables.
sentences.cn: 指数可以用于反映一组变量的综合变化.

sentences.en: A small difference between them will render the composite translucent.
sentences.cn: 微小的差别,也会使复合材料变成半透明.

sentences.en: Asbestos reinforcement confers excellent flame retardation properties on a composite.
sentences.cn: 石棉增强材料使复合材料具有优异的防火性能.

sentences.en: Cuba is a composite of diverse traditions and people.
sentences.cn: 古巴是一个不同传统和民族的融合体。

sentences.en: Each was a composite of three scoops of silt.
sentences.cn: 每个样品由三样勺河床淤泥组成.

sentences.en: English is a composite of many languages.
sentences.cn: 英语是多种语言混合而成的.

sentences.en: Fiber glass is a composite containing a plastic strengthened by the addition of glass fibers.
sentences.cn: 玻璃纤维是借外加玻璃丝以增强塑料强度的一种合成材料.

sentences.en: Galton devised a method of creating composite pictures in which the features of different faces were superimposed over one another.
sentences.cn: 高尔顿发明了一种把不同人的五官相互叠加在一起的制作合成照片的方法。

sentences.en: Similar relations can be formulated also for other composite waves.
sentences.cn: 其它合成波的相似关系也可以用公式表示.

sentences.en: Spain is a composite of multifarious traditions and people.
sentences.cn: 西班牙是多种传统和多个民族的合成体。

sentences.en: The author builds up a useful compo-site picture of contemporary consumer culture.
sentences.cn: 作者勾勒出了一幅实用的当代消费文化全景图。

sentences.en: The child’s character was a composite of two girls I knew.
sentences.cn: 这孩子的性格综合了我认识的两个女孩的个性。

sentences.en: The derivative of the composite function is the product of the derivatives of the components.
sentences.cn: 复合函数的导数是构成函数的导数之积.

sentences.en: The price is the composite opinion of all the people who buy and sell that stock.
sentences.cn: 股票价格反映了所有买卖这种股票的人的综合意见.

sentences.en: The simplest form of a composite index is an unweighted aggregates index.
sentences.cn: 综合指数最简单的形式是不加权数的总计指数.

sentences.en: These composite indices are derived by standardizing each of its component series.
sentences.cn: 这些综合指数是使通过把它们的组成部分中的各个数列标准化而获得的.

sentences.en: These differences are connected with the strong absorption of the composite projectiles.
sentences.cn: 这些差别与复杂的入射粒子的强烈吸收有关.

sentences.en: This composite illustration was made by putting together a number of drawings.
sentences.cn: 这本综合说明书是集若干图片汇合而成的.

words.tran_cn: 作文，作曲；[材] 构成；合成物
组成；作曲（compose的过去分词）；著作
构成；写作；使平静；排…的版

phrases.tran_cn: 复合板；合成板；多层纸板；复合纸板
复合指标；财经综合指数
组合结构；复合机构；混合结构

trans.tran_cn: 拼成的，混合成的，复合的
trans.tran_en: made up of different parts or materials

trans.tran_cn: 合成物，混合物，复合材料
trans.tran_en: something made up of different parts or materials
